mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feature_result (`name`, cert_no, age, mobile, apply_time, marry_status, work_company, income_range, contact_name1, contact_relation1, contact_mobile1, contact_remark1, contact_name2, contact_relation2, contact_mobile2, contact_remark2, request_ip, device_type, device_mac, device_risk) VALUES (#{name}, #{certNo}, #{age}, #{mobile}, #{apply_time}, #{marry_status}, #{work_company}, #{income_range}, #{contact_name1}, #{contact_relation1}, #{contact_mobile1}, #{contact_remark1}, #{contact_name2}, #{contact_relation2}, #{contact_mobile2}, #{contact_remark2}, #{request_ip}, #{device_type}, #{device_mac}, #{device_risk});

mapper.select: update feature_result set `name`=#{name}, cert_no=#{certNo}, age=#{age}, mobile=#{mobile}, apply_time=#{apply_time}, marry_status=#{marry_status}, work_company=#{work_company}, income_range=#{income_range}, contact_name1=#{contact_name1}, contact_relation1=#{contact_relation1}, contact_mobile1=#{contact_mobile1}, contact_remark1=#{contact_remark1}, contact_name2=#{contact_name2}, contact_relation2=#{contact_relation2}, contact_mobile2=#{contact_mobile2}, contact_remark2=#{contact_remark2}, request_ip=#{request_ip}, device_type=#{device_type}, device_mac=#{device_mac}, device_risk=#{device_risk} where id = #{id}
select id from feature_result where id = 1000
